project.teaser: With our project, we aspire to explore novel ways to capture, preserve, curate, organise and communicate sets of unstructured entrepreneurial experiences, stories, narratives with an emphasis to those of younger audience that is addressing the challenge of (self)employability...
project.objective: With our project, we aspire to explore novel ways to capture, preserve, curate, organise and communicate sets of unstructured entrepreneurial experiences, stories, narratives with an emphasis to those of younger audience that is addressing the challenge of (self)employability, so that they can constitute a shared resource that people can augment, and that individuals as well as institutions can delve into, to find inspiration for new ways of conceptualising and promoting entrepreneurship, and how these new ways can be reflected into every-day practices and policies, and foundations for visions of our common European future.
project.title: Excellency in Entrepreneurship: Expanding European entrepreneurship by boosting youth (self) employability and promoting a sharing resources culture

category.description: Article: description of linked project written by editorial team

result.title: D5.2.1 Communication and Dissemination actions report - first report
result.description: This deliverable will be the output of Task 52 will be constantly updated during the project implementation M6 M18 and M30 and will include the detailed planning of all communication activities of the Excellent campaign and promotion in a systematic manner Definition and implementation of Dissemination plan channels measures and tools in the first version Continuously updated and synchronised with the project activities Joint events with relevant initiatives project promotion

result.title: D4.3 High level report for adoption measures (policy makers manual)
result.description: This deliverable is the outcome of the reporting and consolidation performed in T4.3 of evidence and results obtained from the interaction with public authorities during the project implementation, presented as a Policy Manual.

result.title: D4.1 Cooperation, roll-out and engagement events
result.description: This deliverable will present the activities implemented under T4.1 to further strengthen and expand the Excellent entrepreneurial ecosystem, including the indicators of new enrollments, members, new best solutions and approaches to identify needs, extra regions of scouting, collection of local contacts, reinforcement of collaboration and matchmaking process and more.

result.title: Common pool and services for entrepreneurial resources
Impact measurement and monitoring
D1.2 Mapping of the key entrepreneurial competences
result.description: This deliverable is an output of the analysis of Task 1.2 and will include mapping of most important entrepreneurial competences and attitudes sand the most efficient path to acquire them.

result.title: Service components for connecting cross-border entrepreneurial ecosystems
D1.1 Compendium of interview with entrepreneurial ecosystem stakeholders
result.description: This deliverable is an output of Task 11 and will include a consolidation of interview results conducted with successful entrepreneurs and ecosystem stakeholders and an analysis of the conclusions provided by each consortium partner

result.title: D5.2.3 Communication and Dissemination actions report - final report
result.description: This deliverable will be the output of Task 5.2 will be constantly updated during the project implementation (M3, M18 and M30) and will include the detailed planning of all communication activities of the Excellent campaign and promotion in a systematic manner.

result.title: Excellence in Entrepreneurship Conference
Periodic Reporting for period 1 - ExcellEnt (Excellency in Entrepreneurship: Expanding European entrepreneurship by boosting youth (self) employability and promoting a sharing resources culture)
result.teaser: The ExcellEnt Project, funded by the Horizon Europe programme of the European Union, aims to revolutionize the European business landscape by strengthening and homogenizing business practices across the continent. This collaborative project between six entrepreneurial...
result.description: periodic

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Report on the acquired experiences in entrepreneurial ecosystems discovery
D3.3 Report on the acquired experiences in entrepreneurial ecosystems discovery
result.description: This deliverable includes the results of the immersive entrepreneurial ecosystems mapping and identification performed in T3.3. including the results of the bidirectional mobilities between ecosystems of the selected 20 participants (testimonials, activities, synergies fostered and overall assessment of the experience).

result.title: D3.4 Excellence in entrepreneurship conference
result.description: This deliverable is the output of T3.4 which included the implementation and the reporting of the Excellence in entrepreneurship conference, including attendance, presentations, partcipants' feedback etc.

result.title: D2.2 Commonalities identification workshops for cross fertilization within EU ecosystems
result.description: This deliverable is the output of the Workshops implemented inT2.2, including results, feedback and number of interactions and collaboration among members.

result.title: D3.2 Common pool and services for entrepreneurial resources
result.description: This deliverable is an output of T3.2 and will include the creation and aggregation of a set of contents and materials which will be used as entrepreneurial resources and other digital tools that will be offered via the Academy platform (T3.1).

result.title: D1.4 Entrepreneurial knowledge sharing across EU ecosystems workshops
result.description: This deliverable will be the output of Task 1.4 consolidating the results of the interactive national workshops and present the conclusions of the final EU-level workshop. This Deliverable will also include a part devoted to the presentation of the conducted activities for the engagement of students throughout the project activities and report on the actions taken to increase synergies and collaboration with each ecosystem and HEIs and business schools of each area.

result.title: D3.1 Operationalisation of the European Entrepreneurship Academy
result.description: This deliverable includes the specification and operationalisation of the Academy platform performed in T3.1 to effectively host community members and deliver added value resources and services. The platform will have the following features: i) landing page of the project activities and services; ii) on-line community; iii) on-line training space, iv) webinars and MOOCs on various entrepreneurial topics; v) marketplace for matchmaking; vi) access knowledge points (training, coaching, mentorship); and vii) other sources of funding and visibility.

result.title: Mapping of key entrepreneurial competences
D5.2.2 Communication and Dissemination actions report - interim report
result.description: This deliverable will be the output of Task 5.2 will be constantly updated during the project implementation (M3, M18 and M30) and will include the detailed planning of all communication activities of the Excellent campaign and promotion in a systematic manner.

result.title: Entrepreneurial Best Practices Report
D2.1 Report on the SWOT analysis of entrepreneurial ecosystems
result.description: This deliverable is the output of T21 reporting the SWOT analysis of the 6 entrepreneurial ecosystems including their needs capacity assessment and matchmaking suggestions with relevant stakeholders across Europe

result.title: Entrepreneurial knowledge sharing across EU ecosystems workshops
D4.2 Ecosystem builder’s handbook and toolkit
result.description: This deliverable includes the interactive online resources (handbook and toolkit) identified in T4.2 as the most affective methodologies and tools for ecosystem builders.

result.title: Commonalities identification workshops for cross fertilization within EU ecosystems
D6.3.1 Impact measurement and monitoring
result.description: This deliverable presents a comprehensive framework for measuring the impact of the ExcellEnt project as well as outlining the monitoring process that will be employed to ensure that the project stays on track in terms of meeting its goals and objectivesThe impact measurement framework is designed to assess the various ways in which the project contributes to the wider community and to evaluate its overall effectiveness By defining a set of measurable indicators and metrics we can objectively assess the success of the project and identify areas for improvementIn addition to the impact measurement framework this deliverable also presents the monitoring process that will be put in place to track the progress of the project This process will include regular data collection analysis and reporting to ensure that the project is achieving its objectives and producing the desired results

result.title: D6.3.2 Impact measurement and monitoring
result.description: This deliverable will be the output of Task 6.3 and includes the: (i) monitoring and methodology and supervision of the project contractual requirements; milestones and financial management; and communication with the EC (ii) monitoring and the assessment of the projects' impacts; (iii) monitoring and assessing (qualitative and quantitatively) the soft landing missions beneficiaries, Stakeholder participation, and local capacity building); (iv) monitoring of risks and mitigation measures.

result.title: D1.3 Entrepreneurial best practices report
result.description: This deliverable will enable to better select and concretely present initiatives and best practices/ cases identified in T1.3.

result.title: Operationalisation of the European Entrepreneurship Academy
D2.3 Service components for connecting cross-border entrepreneurial ecosystems
result.description: This deliverable is the release of the online repository of service components and resources collected in Task 2.3.

result.title: High level report for adoption measures (policy makers manual)
Report on the SWOT Analysis
Impact measurement and monitoring

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
